text: Fecal samples collected from all the puppies during the study period were screened by polymerase chain reaction (PCR) for the common enteropathogens, including the bacteria, their toxins and viruses. The organisms that were screened include E. colishiga and enterotoxin (LT), C. perfringens -alpha (cpa) and C. perfringens enterotoxin (cpe) C. difficile and its toxin B, Salmonella sp., Campylobacter sp., and the viruses such as CPV-2b strain, CDV, enteric CCoV, and Rotavirus.
